dropzone.supportedFormats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP, SVG supported

warnings.noReposSelected: Please select at least one repository to get started

empty.noTasks: No tasks found for this project.

dialog.title: Rebase Task Attempt
dialog.description: Choose a new base branch to rebase this task attempt onto.

dialog.title: Change target branch
dialog.description: Choose a new target branch for the task attempt.

dialog.title: Change Repository
dialog.description: Choose a repository for git operations.
dialog.label: Repository

preview.title: Preview
preview.selectAttempt: Select an attempt to see preview

troubleAlert.title: We're having trouble previewing your application:
troubleAlert.item1: Did the dev server start successfully? There may be a bug you need to resolve, or perhaps dependencies need to be installed.
troubleAlert.item2: Did your dev server print the URL and port to the terminal in the format
troubleAlert.item2Suffix: ? (this is how we know it's running)
troubleAlert.item3: Have you installed the Web Companion (required for click-to-edit)? If not, please

noServer.title: No dev server running
noServer.startPrompt: Please start a dev server to see the preview
noServer.setupTitle: You must set up a dev server script to use the preview feature
noServer.setupPrompt: To use the live preview and click-to-edit, please add a dev server script to this project.
noServer.companionPrompt: For click-to-edit functionality, add the browser companion to your project.

preview.noDevScriptHint: Configure a dev script in project settings to use the preview

loading.manualUrlHint: No URL detected yet. You can manually enter a URL in the toolbar above.

diff.noChanges: No changes have been made yet

largeDiff.title: Large file
largeDiff.warning: Large diffs may slow down your browser.

processes.selectAttempt: Select an attempt to view execution processes.
processes.errorLoadingUpdates: Failed to load live updates for processes.
processes.noProcesses: No execution processes found for this attempt.
processes.deletedTooltip: Deleted by restore: timeline was restored to a checkpoint and later executions were removed
processes.errorLoadingDetails: Failed to load process details. Please try again.

toolbar.startFirstAttempt: Start your first attempt to begin working on this task

followUp.queuedMessage: Message queued - will execute when current run finishes
followUp.noSetupScript: No setup script configured for this project
followUp.noCleanupScript: No cleanup script configured for this project
followUp.scriptsDisabledWhileRunning: Cannot run scripts while a process is running

dialog.title: Create Project
dialog.description: Enter a name for your new project.

attempt.setupHelpText: {{agent}} isn't setup correctly. Click 'Run Setup' to install it and login.
attempt.devScriptMissingTooltip: To start the dev server, add a dev script to this project

forcePushDialog.title: Force Push Required
forcePushDialog.description: The remote branch{{branchLabel}} has diverged from your local branch. A regular push was rejected.
forcePushDialog.warning: Force pushing will overwrite the remote changes with your local changes. This action cannot be undone.
forcePushDialog.note: Only proceed if you're certain you want to replace the remote branch history.

errors.branchStatusUnavailable: Unable to fetch branch status. You can still change the target branch.

loginRequired.title: Sign in to manage git actions
loginRequired.description: Sign in to Vibe Kanban so you can push branches, merge changes, or open pull requests for this task.

mergeDialog.title: Merge Changes
mergeDialog.description: This will merge your changes into the target branch. Are you sure you want to continue?

browseDialog.title: Select Parent Directory
browseDialog.description: Choose where to create the new repository

createAttemptDialog.title: Create Attempt
createAttemptDialog.description: Start a new attempt with a coding agent. A git worktree and task branch will be created.
createAttemptDialog.error: Failed to create attempt. Please try again.

attemptRepoSelector.label: Repositories
attemptRepoSelector.empty: No repositories selected. Add at least one repository.

addRepo.title: Select Git Repository
addRepo.description: Choose a git repository to add to this attempt

viewRelatedTasksDialog.title: Related tasks
viewRelatedTasksDialog.empty: No related tasks for this attempt

dialog.title: Edit Branch Name
dialog.description: Enter a new name for the branch. Cannot rename if an open PR exists.

startReviewDialog.title: Start Review
startReviewDialog.description: Ask the coding agent to review your changes and provide feedback.
startReviewDialog.includeGitContextDescription: Tells the agent how to view all changes made on this branch

dialog.title: Resolve Conflicts
dialog.description: Conflicts were detected. Choose how you want the agent to resolve them.

createPrDialog.title: Create Pull Request
createPrDialog.description: Create a pull request for this task attempt.

errors.insufficientPermissions: Insufficient permissions. Please ensure the CLI has the necessary permissions.
errors.repoNotFoundOrNoAccess: Repository not found or no access. Please check your repository access and ensure you are authenticated.
errors.gitCliNotLoggedIn: Git is not authenticated. Run "gh auth login" (or configure Git credentials) and try again.
errors.gitCliNotInstalled: Git CLI is not installed. Install Git to create a PR.
errors.targetBranchNotFound: Target branch '{{branch}}' does not exist on remote. Please ensure the branch exists before creating a pull request.

loginRequired.title: Sign in to create a pull request
loginRequired.description: You need to sign in before you can open a pull request for this task. We'll take you to the sign-in page.

companion.title: Vibe Kanban Companion Point-and-Click
companion.description: Click any UI component in the preview window to select it precisely. The coding agent receives exact DOM selectors and component hierarchy, eliminating ambiguous feedback.

installation.title: Dev Server & Companion Installation
installation.description: Set a dev server command for previews, with a setup script configurable in settings. Use a coding agent to automatically install the Vibe Kanban web companion.

codeReview.title: Built-in Code Review
codeReview.description: Add line-specific comments directly in the diffs view with the plus icon. All feedback is collected and sent as a complete review to the coding agent.

pullRequest.title: Create PR from Task
pullRequest.description: Merge your changes or create pull requests directly from task attempts. The PR dialog pre-fills title and description from your task details for streamlined workflows.

tags.title: Custom Prompt Tags
tags.description: Save custom prompts as tags and embed them within new tasks or follow-up messages. Reuse common instructions to maintain consistency across your workflow.

dialog.title: Select PR Comments
dialog.noComments: No comments found on this PR

card.tooltip: Click to view, double-click to edit

taskFormDialog.descriptionPlaceholder: Add more details (optional). Type @ to search files.

discardDialog.title: Discard unsaved changes?
discardDialog.description: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

terminal.selectWorkspace: Select a workspace to open terminal

historyChange.title: History change
historyChange.permanentWarning: This permanently alters history and cannot be undone.

uncommittedChanges.title: Uncommitted changes detected
uncommittedChanges.acknowledgeLabel: I understand these changes may be affected

resetWorktree.title: Reset worktree
resetWorktree.restoreDescription: Your worktree will be restored to this commit.
resetWorktree.rollbackCommits_one: Roll back {{count}} commit from current HEAD.
resetWorktree.rollbackCommits_other: Roll back {{count}} commits from current HEAD.
resetWorktree.untrackedPresent_one: {{count}} untracked file present (not affected by reset).
resetWorktree.untrackedPresent_other: {{count}} untracked files present (not affected by reset).
resetWorktree.uncommittedPresentHint: Uncommitted changes present. Turn on Force reset or commit/stash to proceed.

createWorkspaceFromPr.title: Create Workspace from PR
createWorkspaceFromPr.description: Select an open pull request to create a workspace from. A task will be created automatically using the PR title.
createWorkspaceFromPr.searchPrsPlaceholder: Search PRs by number or title...

errors.repoNotInProject: Repository is not in any project
